Achievements.Name: The Pooch Pamperer
Achievements.Description: Play fetch with your dog, or see another Hero's dog play.

Achievements.Name: The Archaeologist
Achievements.Description: Dig up something the dog has discovered, or see another Hero do so.

Achievements.Name: The Dog Trainer
Achievements.Description: Teach your dog a trick, or see another Hero's dog learn one.

Achievements.Name: The Persuader
Achievements.Description: Convince a villager to give you a present, or see another Hero do so.

Achievements.Name: The Show-off
Achievements.Description: Impress a villager with a perfect expression, or see another Hero do so.

Achievements.Name: The Romantic
Achievements.Description: Take a villager on a perfect date, or tag along to one. Location and expressions are all-important.

Achievements.Name: The Spouse
Achievements.Description: Marry a villager, or attend the wedding of another Hero.

Achievements.Name: The Parent
Achievements.Description: Have a child, or be there for the birth of another Hero's child.

Achievements.Name: The Hunter
Achievements.Description: Kill a sweet, innocent, fluffy bunny rabbit (remember, safety's off!)

Achievements.Name: The Gargoyle
Achievements.Description: Find the gargoyles' legendary treasure.

Achievements.Name: The Chicken Kicker
Achievements.Description: Kick a chicken a good distance, or see one getting kicked.

Achievements.Name: The Cliff Diver
Achievements.Description: Cliff dive 500 feet, or see another Hero do so.

Achievements.Name: The Workhorse
Achievements.Description: A Hero must achieve a high-enough chain while performing a job.

Achievements.Name: The Hero of Many Names
Achievements.Description: Change your Hero's title, or see another Hero change theirs.

Achievements.Name: The Teaser
Achievements.Description: Make bandits respond to expressions with fear, anger, mirth, and confusion... during combat!

Achievements.Name: The Property Magnate
Achievements.Description: A property must be sold for twice the price it was bought for.

Achievements.Name: The Rogue
Achievements.Description: Steal something undetected from a building while there are people nearby, or see another Hero do so.

Achievements.Name: The Illustrated Hero
Achievements.Description: Tattoo every part of your Hero's body, or see another Hero do so.

Achievements.Name: The Executioner
Achievements.Description: Sacrifice ten people in the Temple of Shadows, or see another Hero do so.

Achievements.Name: The Gambler
Achievements.Description: A Hero must win 500 gold at a pub game in one sitting, having tried each game type at least once.

Achievements.Name: The Bigamist
Achievements.Description: Get married a second time, whilst already married, or attend the second wedding of another Hero.

Achievements.Name: The Swinger
Achievements.Description: Take part in a debauched bedroom party with several participants.

Achievements.Name: The Pied Piper
Achievements.Description: Start a party where at least five villagers are dancing, or see another Hero do so.

Achievements.Name: The Party Animal
Achievements.Description: Get five villagers drunk in under three minutes, or see another Hero do so.

Achievements.Name: The Menace To Society
Achievements.Description: Commit an act of public indecency, or see another Hero commit one.

Achievements.Name: The Black Knight
Achievements.Description: Shoot the weapons from a hollow man's hands, blow off his head and then kill him for good!

Achievements.Name: The Duellist
Achievements.Description: String together a full-speed chain attack, or see another Hero do so.

Achievements.Name: The Sharpshooter
Achievements.Description: Hit three enemies with one shot, or see another Hero do so.

Achievements.Name: The Archmage
Achievements.Description: A Hero must kill five human enemies with one spell.

Achievements.Name: The Ruler of Albion
Achievements.Description: Amass a 2.5 million gold real estate empire, or be there when another Hero does.

Achievements.Name: The Hoarder
Achievements.Description: Collect every silver key, or see another Hero do so.

Achievements.Name: The Goth
Achievements.Description: A Hero must dye their hair black, and wear a black outfit and black makeup.

Achievements.Name: The Completionist
Achievements.Description: Get all expressions, pet tricks and abilities, or see another Hero do so.

Achievements.Name: The Paragon
Achievements.Description: Reach 100% good or evil, or see another Hero do so.

Achievements.Name: The Extremist
Achievements.Description: Reach 100% purity or corruption, or see another Hero do so.

Achievements.Name: The Celebrity
Achievements.Description: Reach 50,000 renown, or see another Hero do so.

Achievements.Name: The Artisan
Achievements.Description: Succeed at one job to Level 5, or see another Hero do so.

Achievements.Name: The Dollcatcher
Achievements.Description: Collect all the Hero dolls, or see another Hero collect them.

Achievements.Name: The Muse
Achievements.Description: Inspire the Bard to compose songs celebrating your great deeds.

Achievements.Name: The Companions
Achievements.Description: Perform a perfect co-op expression.

Achievements.Name: The Double Threat
Achievements.Description: Get a co-op combat bonus.

Achievements.Name: The Philanthropist
Achievements.Description: Send a gift to an Xbox LIVE friend, or watch another Hero send one.

Achievements.Name: The Whippersnapper
Achievements.Description: A child Hero must collect five gold pieces.

Achievements.Name: The New Hero
Achievements.Description: The terror of Bower Lake must be defeated.

Achievements.Name: The Hero of Strength
Achievements.Description: Complete The Hero of Strength.

Achievements.Name: The Hero of Will
Achievements.Description: Complete The Hero of Will.

Achievements.Name: The Hero of Skill
Achievements.Description: Complete The Hero of Skill.

Achievements.Name: The Sacrifice
Achievements.Description: A Hero must choose 'The Needs of the Many'.

Achievements.Name: The Family
Achievements.Description: A Hero must choose 'The Needs of The Few'.

Achievements.Name: The Egomaniac
Achievements.Description: A Hero must choose 'The Needs of the One'.
